p: Mono-allyl rosin derivatives have been also synthesized in recent years. Allyl rosinate can be prepared in aqueous [ 181] or ethanol [ 182] medium from rosin, sodium hydroxide and allyl chloride according to Scheme 19, prior to filtration and distillation [ 181]. It can be potentially applied as an unsaturated monomer in copolymerization reactions [ 181] as well as in UV-cured resins [ 182]. On the other hand, allyl maleopimarate can be prepared in THF from maleopimaric acid, oxalyl chloride and allyl alcohol according to Scheme 19, and using such separation methods as vacuum distillation and column chromatography [ 90]. It can be used in unsaturated resins and epoxy resins as a cross-linking agent [ 90].
